title: The Problem with Forever
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout
description: A moving story about friendship, survival, and finding your voice.

description: A deeply emotional and thought-provoking romance novel.

title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A chilling psychological thriller with twists and turns.

description: A mesmerizing blend of fantasy, romance, and action.

title: Circe

description: A stunning reimagining of the life of the enchantress Circe.
